hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "----------Prom Env Build Start----------" echo "This is the new line in my index.html - file" >> index.html echo "----------Prom Env Build End----------"

echo "----------Prom Env Test Start----------" tempResult=`grep "This page is from GitHub repo" index.html | grep "Arial" | wc -l` echo $tempResult if [ "$tempResult" = "1" ] then echo "Test Successfully Passed" # exit 0 else echo "Test Failed" exit 1 fi echo "----------Prom Env Test End----------"
